duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and prepare the preparation of food to be served to residents, guests, and staff.
Maintain quality service and provide professional and technical knowledge in food production.
Plan menus, order food, and ensure appropriate use of facility supplies and equipment.
Hire, orient, train, and schedule kitchen staff according to budget and event needs.
Establish strategic goals, accomplish financial objectives, and maintain a safe, secure, and compliant work environment.
Ensure efficient operation of the kitchen following established food production programs and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Culinary Arts, Hospitality Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
